duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with stakeholders to identify and clarify business or product questions.
Use custom data infrastructure or existing data models to design and evaluate mathematical models.
Gather information, business goals, priorities, and organizational context surrounding questions to be answered.
Own the process of gathering, extracting, and compiling data using relevant tools (e.g., SQL, R, Python).
Independently format, re-structure, and validate data to ensure quality, and review the dataset for analysis readiness.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in Statistics, Data Science, Mathematics, Physics, Economics, Operations Research, Engineering, or a related quantitative field
